Directions: In a large skillet, cook sausage over medium heat until no longer pink; drain on paper towels. In a large bowl, combine 1-3/4 cups cheese and the next seven ingredients; fold in potatoes.

Spread half into a greased shallow 3-qt. baking dish. Top with sausage and remaining potato mixture. Sprinkle with remaining cheese. cover and bake at 350 degrees F for 45 minutes. Uncover; bake 10 minutes longer or until heated through.
Ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup, undiluted
1 (30 ounce) package frozen shredded hash brown potatoes, thawed
